long_description: Enjoy a tasty treat when you're on the trail with Panda All-Natural licorice. Panda licorice is all-natural and fat free, and contains no preservatives, no artificial colors and no artificial flavors. Blueberry flavor is made with real blueberries for a mouthwatering taste sensation. Cherry flavor includes real cherries for a taste you can't resist. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Enjoy a tasty treat when you're on the trail with Panda All-Natural licorice.
